definition: to stick to sth without change (idiom); to persevere
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
short name for Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2 qing4]/old name of Jialing river 嘉陵江[Jia1 ling2 jiang1] in Sichuan

sentences.english: If you hang on in your work , you'll succeed in the end .
sentences.chinese: 如果你在工作中坚持不渝，最后是能成功的。

sentences.english: "Gathering essence, creating classical"is persistent pursuing aim.
sentences.chinese: “皆熔精华，鼎铸经典”是本厂坚持不渝的追求目标。

sentences.english: Caozhi paid great attention to the morality, and insisted on the morality even in adversity.
sentences.chinese: 曹植重视立德，即使身处逆境也能坚持不渝。

definition: to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
to chip away at a task and not abandon it (idiom); to chisel away at sth/to persevere/unflagging efforts
to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom)/to be undaunted by repeated setbacks/to be indomitable
to take an oath to do sth/to pledge/to vow
see 百折不撓|百折不挠[bai3 zhe2 bu4 nao2]
see 磨杵成針|磨杵成针[mo2 chu3 cheng2 zhen1]
to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task/to study diligently
